issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on table view scroll indicators does not give us any page with table & refresh button.

Steps to reproduce:

Iphone:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on Base UI tab.
6.Tap on the Views table row.
7.Tap on the Table Views table row.
8.Tap on the table view scroll indicators table row.

Windows Phone Mango:
1.Unable to execute the test case as we can't scroll down to unhide the table view scroll indicators table row.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on table view scroll indicators does not give us any page with table & refresh button.

Expected result:
1:Tap on the refresh button on the right.scroll down or up.
2:Should see a vertical scroll bar on the right.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: BaseUI-->Views-->TableViews-->Table View Scroll Indicators:Tapping on table view scroll indicators does not give us any page with table &  refresh button.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206010843
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v2012060201244
Iphone 4
iOS Version : 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
